article.title: Defense Threat Reduction Agency Awards Biomimetic Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Sanofi Pasteur VaxDesign Corporation,Â Orlando, Fla., is being awarded a $15,106,789 cost-plus fixed-fee, incrementally-funded contract for research and development services for the Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA) to further optimize and utilize the invitro biomimetic immune system. The contract award was a direct response to DTRA's Chem-Bio Broad Agency Announcement. The contracting activity is Defense Threat Reduction Agency, Fort Belvoir, Va.
